mapper.select: SELECT /* DlwOnlnMngMap.getOnlnMemberDtlList */ * FROM ( SELECT MST.ID , MST.UNQ_NO , MST.NAME , MST.BIRTH , MST.EMAIL , MST.HP , MST.TEL , MST.ZIPCD , MST.ADR , MST.ADR_DTL , MST.USE_YN , MST.LAST_LGN_DTM , MST.REG_DTM , MST.SMS_RCV_YN , MST.EMAIL_RCV_YN , MST.AGREEMENT_FOR_THIRD_PARTY , MST.MARKETING_YN , MST.CI, SSO.ID AS SSO_ID, MB.MEM_NO, MB.CI_VAL, MB.MEM_NM, MB.EMAIL AS MB_EMAIL, MB.CELL, MB.HOME_ZIP, MB.HOME_ADDR, MB.HOME_ADDR2 FROM MB_MEM_MST MST LEFT OUTER JOIN LF_DMUSER.MEMBER@DMLIFE MB ON MST.UNQ_NO = MB.MEM_NO AND MB.DEL_FG = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CI, MAX(ID) AS ID FROM DAEMYUNG_SSO.TSSO_MEM@DM_DLW_KT GROUP BY CI ) SSO ON MST.CI = SSO.CI WHERE 1=1 AND MST.ID = #{id} )

SELECT /* DlwOnlnMngMap.getOnlnMemberDormancyDtl */ * FROM ( SELECT MST.ID , MST.UNQ_NO , MST.NAME , MST.BIRTH , MST.EMAIL , MST.HP , MST.TEL , MST.ZIPCD , MST.ADR , MST.ADR_DTL , MST.USE_YN , MST.LAST_LGN_DTM , MST.REG_DTM , MST.SMS_RCV_YN , MST.EMAIL_RCV_YN , MST.AGREEMENT_FOR_THIRD_PARTY , MST.MARKETING_YN , MST.CI, SSO.ID AS SSO_ID, MB.MEM_NO, MB.CI_VAL, MB.MEM_NM, MB.EMAIL AS MB_EMAIL, MB.CELL, MB.HOME_ZIP, MB.HOME_ADDR, MB.HOME_ADDR2 FROM MB_QSCN_MEM_MST MST LEFT OUTER JOIN LF_DMUSER.MEMBER@DMLIFE MB ON MST.UNQ_NO = MB.MEM_NO AND MB.DEL_FG = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ID FROM DAEMYUNG_SSO.TSSO_MEM@DM_DLW_KT GROUP BY ID ) SSO ON MST.ID = SSO.ID WHERE 1=1 AND MST.ID = #{id} )

SELECT /* DlwOnlnMngMap.getOnlnPayChgDtlList */ ACCNT_NO, REG_DTM, PRCS_YN, AFT_PMT_GB, AFT_BANK_CD, AFT_BANK_NM, AFT_ACNT_NO, AFT_CARD_CD, AFT_CARD_NM, AFT_CARD_NO, AFT_CARD_EXPR_YR, AFT_CARD_EXPR_MM, AFT_PMT_DAY, (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CD_DTL WHERE CD_ID = 'HAPPY_CALL' AND CD = A.HYCL_ABLE_TIME) AS HP_TIME FROM CM_ACNT_CHNG_PTC A WHERE ID = #{id} ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC
SELECT /* DlwOnlnMngMap.getOnlnMemChngCount */ COUNT(*) FROM MB_MEM_CHNG_PTC WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(REG_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{stt_dt} AND #{end_dt}

SELECT /* DlwOnlnMngMap.getOnlnMemChngList */ * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${orderDirection}) PAGE_INDX, CHNG_SEQ, ID, BFR_NAME, BFR_EMAIL, BFR_HP, BFR_TEL, BFR_ZIPCD, BFR_ADR, BFR_ADR_DTL, AFT_NAME, AFT_EMAIL, AFT_HP, AFT_TEL, AFT_ZIPCD, AFT_ADR, AFT_ADR_DTL, PRCS_YN, REG_ID, REG_IP, REG_DTM, MOD_ID, MOD_IP, MOD_DTM, BFR_PWD, AFT_PWD, BFR_BIRTH, AFT_BIRTH FROM MB_MEM_CHNG_PTC WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(REG_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{stt_dt} AND #{end_dt} )
WHERE PAGE_INDX >= #{startLine} AND PAGE_INDX < #{endLine}
